c7e7ba6759a1bf6cc4146bea5eace32d (02:21): can't mp4 be played with html5 in firefox5?

4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (02:22): c7e7ba6759a1bf6cc4146bea5eace32d: no. for video you need to serve your h264 mp4 and a webm file
c7e7ba6759a1bf6cc4146bea5eace32d (02:23): even if it's not vp8+vorbis?

4c681049601b3c374f1d2c0077c99049 (02:26): use ffmpeg on the command line bro

0fe8692be7a494c6561f745b9f3b0d17 (02:30): and then absolute last resort in flash
